import{CurrencyAmount,ETHER,JSBI}from'@pancakeswap/sdk';import{MIN_BNB}from'../config/constants';/**
 * Given some token amount, return the max that can be spent of it
 * @param currencyAmount to return max of
 */export function maxAmountSpend(currencyAmount){if(!currencyAmount)return undefined;if(currencyAmount.currency===ETHER){if(JSBI.greaterThan(currencyAmount.raw,MIN_BNB)){return CurrencyAmount.ether(JSBI.subtract(currencyAmount.raw,MIN_BNB));}return CurrencyAmount.ether(JSBI.BigInt(0));}return currencyAmount;}export default maxAmountSpend;
